text: Esporte Clube Santo André, also known as Santo André, is a Brazilian football team from Santo André, São Paulo state. Its main rival is São Caetano. ==Achievements== *Copa do Brasil: 1 ::2004 *Brazilian Championship Serie B: 0 ::Runners-up (1): 2008 *Brazilian Championship Serie C: 0 ::Runners-up (1): 2003 *Copa São Paulo de Futebol Júnior: 1 ::2003 *Copa FPF: 1 ::2003 *Campeonato Paulista: 0 ::Runners-up (1): 2010 *Campeonato Paulista A-2: 3 ::1975, 1981, 2008 Santo Andre Category:1967 establishments Category:1960s establishments in Brazil Category:Santo André
title: Esporte Clube Santo André
